transcript: I like working more than I like doing just about anything else and so I work with all the hours that I can until I can't work anymore and then at that point I go into rest mode and whatever I feel like resting with which whether that's a day at the pool whether that's watching Netflix or going to a movie or just like a big workout morning into like brunch and hanging out with buddies that's what I do to recharge and I see that as active and productive because it increases my total output for the week or the months
